error.message: Call to deprecated function file_unmanaged_delete_recursive(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::deleteRecursive().
Call to deprecated function archiver_get_extensions(). Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Archiver\ArchiverManager::getExtensions() instead.

Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to responsive_favicons.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
